title: Panel, "Les Quatre Saisons (The Four Seasons)", late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 250 x 78 cm (8 ft. 2 7/16 in. x 30 11/16 in.)
description: Long panel of rural scenes indicative of the four seasons of the year (skating, maypole, fishing, harvesting) in red on white. Panel bound with woven tape on both sides. Quilted.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, "Les Quatre Saisons (The Four Seasons)", late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-87.
